content.text:
# Tiscali Short Film Award

The Tiscali Short Film Award is a major short film award, sponsored by Tiscali and presented at the Raindance Film Festival each year since 2005 to the "best UK short under 10 minutes by a debut filmmaker".[http://www.raindance.co.uk/site/index.php?id=97,618,0,0,1,0 raindance.co.uk: Festival Awards]
Films which have won, or been nominated for, the award have gone on to achieve other notable successes, including a BAFTA Award,[https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0967933/awards Fetch (2006) - Awards] two BAFTA Award nominations,[https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0499475/awards Film Noir (2005) - Awards] a Golden Palm nomination at the Cannes Film Festival, an Audience Award at the Kraków Film Festival, a Merit Award at the Arizona International Film Festival,[http://www.betweentheeyes.co.uk/page/news Between The Eyes]  a Best Newcomer Award at the Rushes Soho Shorts Festival, a BBC Three New Filmmakers Award nomination[http://www.encounters-festival.org.uk/pages/whatson/onShow.php?festival=4&show=141 Encounters Short Film Festival: What’s On: Screening: BBC THREE NEW FILM MAKERS AWARD 2007]  and a Best Short Film nomination at the Rushes Soho Shorts Festival.[http://www.ukscreenassociation.co.uk/news/articles.htm?aId=306 UK Screen Association News – Rushes Soho Shorts Festival 2005]
